mapper.insert: insert into board (title, writer, content, create_date, modify_date, count) values(#{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{createDate}, #{modifyDate}, default)
mapper.select: select no, title, writer, create_date as createDate from board
select no, title, writer, content, create_date as createDate, modify_date as modifyDate, count from board where no = #{no}
